name: Mushroom Agent
description:
Mushroom hunter is a casual walkingsimulator game where you need to find all of the mushrooms to win the game and claim your champion of the mushrooms.
You can find mushrooms in different levels and listen to awesome music.
story
You spawn in a new world and your mission is to hunt all the mushrooms and become a champion mushroom hunter.
Features
Jumping
Controls:
W=FORWARD
A=LEFT
S=BACKWARDS
D=RIGHT
SPACE=JUMP
